author: Gerry Plasky
comment: The icons show but no rings for either watch or phone battery. On a Moto 360. UPDATE:Your update fixed my issue. Awesome. Hoping to see some options like maybe percentage numbers instead of watch and phone icons. Love the effects.

reply.author: ROCAS
reply.content: Hi Gerry, its a known bug, you just need to activate Always-on on your Watch to see the 3D animations and battery levels. The fix is coming in the next update. Thanks a lot for your feedback.

title: No battery meters

author: Benjamin Fok
comment: Looks cool but both my battery meter showed less than 10%...pls fix it...latest update fixed the battery meters but now, the face is misaligned on my lg g watch?!

reply.author: ROCAS
reply.content: Hi Benjamin, its a known bug, you just need to activate Always-on on your Watch to see the 3D animations and battery levels. The fix is coming in the next update. Thanks a lot for your feedback.

title: Battery meter wrong
